title: Source
description: Document that provides information about one or more aspects of the incident.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "source--" and is appended with a UUIDv4.

source_type.description: The "source" or author of the source document.

date.description: The date the document was created or most recently modified.

public.description: Whether the document is publicly available.

document.description: A pointer to the document itself, whether a file path, location, url, or document object.

oneOf.title: Court Document
oneOf.description: Legal document from a court case.

oneOf.title: DOJ Press Release
oneOf.description: Press release from the Department of Justice or US Attorneys' Office.

oneOf.title: Investigator Notes
oneOf.description: Raw notes from an incident investigator.

oneOf.title: Logs
oneOf.description: Technical logs from network, server, or user devices.

oneOf.title: Organization Interview
oneOf.description: Direct interview with the victim organization.

oneOf.title: Other
oneOf.description: Other type of source not listed in this vocabulary.
